name: dMRI-freewater
description: Estimate a regular diffusion tensor model (DTI) and up to 2 freewater corrected diffusion models (fwDTI) with equivalent parameter and residual maps

inputs.name: subject
inputs.description: The subject ID to be processed.

inputs.name: session
inputs.description: The session ID to be processed.

inputs.name: dwi_file
inputs.description: The preprocessed DWI .nii.gz file used to fit the DTI / fwDTI model.

inputs.name: dwi_bval
inputs.description: The preprocessed DWI .bval file used to fit the DTI / fwDTI model.

inputs.name: dwi_bvec
inputs.description: The preprocessed DWI .bvec file used to fit the DTI / fwDTI model.

inputs.name: output_dir
inputs.description: The derivatives directory to write results into.

inputs.name: use_shells
inputs.description: The subset of bvalue shells to use during modeling (e.g. '0 1000').
